resources.string:
Author: Shakib Ahmed
Version Number: 1.0 
Instructions:
 1 - Enter latitude and longitude
 2 - Press "Search" button
 3 - Click a station from the list and see detailed information
 4 - Click "Load location in Google Maps" to see location of a station
 5 - Click "Add to favourites" to add a location to the list of favourite stations
 6 - Click "See list of favourite station' to go to the next page with favourite stations
 7 - Click "Delete" to delete a station from the list of favourite stations
